alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A group of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Prowers, central Kiowa and northeastern Bent Counties through 1130 PM MDT... At 1030 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a group of strong thunderstorms over portions of northwestern Prowers, central Kiowa and northeastern Bent Counties , moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lamar, Eads, Wiley, Neeoshe Reservoir, McClave, Sweetwater Reservoir, Chivington, Hasty, Neegronda Reservoir, Queens Reservoir, John Martin Reservoir and Caddoa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County
